bill_title: revise expenditures from cemetery perpetual care funds.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise expenditures from cemetery perpetual care funds. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 55-12-6 be amended to read as follows: 55-12-6. The initial perpetual care fund established for any cemetery shall remain in an irrevocable trust fund until such time as . Notwithstanding § 55-12-8, when this fund has reached reaches fifty thousand dollars, when it may be withdrawn at the rate of one thousand dollars from the original twenty-five thousand dollars for each additional three thousand dollars added to the fund, until all of the twenty-five thousand dollars has been withdrawn amounts in excess of that amount may be expended, upon application to the circuit court, for the care and maintenance of the cemetery or to purchase real property, equipment, and supplies used for the expansion, care, or maintenance of the cemetery . 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
